channel.title: Caskets
channel.description: hey well when i kill a rockcrab it drops a casket and i need to make that casket open and give someone cash or jewls or something liek that anyone know how?

item.title: Caskets
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

Look for:

case 122:

This is the first click packet typically used for burying bones or identifying herbs.

You can use many methods for doing this.

if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) { actionInterval = 1800; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); switch (ItemID) { case CASKET ID: // Casket deleteItem(CASKET ID, 1); sendMessage("You open the casket and receive a reward!"); addItem(REWARD ITEM, 1);; break; } }

This is just a very basic example with a very basic anti-mass click timer (assuming you donâ€™t have that.)

Read full topic
